batterfly.title: Batterfly
batterfly.description: Beastly butterflies who disrupt their enemies with

battleInfo.elementalAversions: Takes 1.25x damage from Fire, Dark, and Light.

gastropog.title: Gastropog
gastropog.description: They slap their sickening long tongues across enemies' faces, and eject 'orrible ooze to slow their foes.
gastropog.secondaryDescription: The size of their shells dictates their status, and the competition for cool carapaces is fairly fierce.

battleInfo.elementalAversions: Takes 1.25x damage from Ice, Dark, and Light.
ailmentAffinities: 50% resistance to Sleep. Immune to Drain Magic and Fizzle.
